attributes.action: Introduce Scottish Dialets in the Scottish Education System
attributes.additional_details: I believe children who live in Scotland should be given the chance to learn to read and write the Scottish language so that all the Scottish dialects don’t become non existent. The Scottish dialect is very important to Scotland’s past and future and children should be able to learn and enjoy everything they can about their language and the country that they live in.
attributes.background: In today’s education system in Scotland children are learning to speak and write other languages (French and German) but struggle to speak or write Scottish dialect. They only learn the language for Robert Burns and they struggle to read and speak it.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:
